item.title: Savaş Vadisi filmin konusu ne, oyuncuları kim? Savaş Vadisi konusu ve oyuncu kadrosu
item.description: Bu akşam ekrana gelecek olan Savaş Vadisi filmi için geri sayım başladı. Dram ve savaş türündeki filmde Desmond T. Doss’un tek bir kurşun bile sıkmadan 75 askeri kurtarmasını anlatan gerçek olaylardan esinlenilmiştir.

item.title: Hotel Tequendama servirá como centro 'semihospitalario' para atender pacientes con covid-19
item.description: A dos días de entrar en vigencia la cuarentena nacional, el presidente Iván Duque informó que el Hotel Tequendama, ubicado en el centro de Bogotá, será adecuado para dar atención médica a los pacientes contagiados por coronavirus.

item.title: How Will Black Widow's Delay Impact The MCU's Future?
item.description: With all these delays and more movies still on the calendar for later in the summer, Disney might not want to place Black Widow among them. Plus, the studio has also delayed Mulan, which is another big-budget release that Disney wants to be a blockbuster just as much as Black Widow.

item.title: CORONAVIRUS 2 – ‘TIE YOUR CAMEL, THEN TRUST IN ALLAH’ – Daily Trust
item.description: ADVERTISEMENT We are still on the rampaging Coronavirus pandemic, bulldozing its way all over the world despite measures put in place to block its advance. May Allah continue to protect us from it and its siblings.

item.title: Liquidators appointed to four USIT travel group firms
item.description: Provisional liquidators have been appointed to four companies in the USIT student travel group, after the Covid-19 crisis caused their collapse. The companies employed 149 people. The High Court was told that many spring and summer travel bookings as well as tours for students and school groups have been cancelled and new bookings have collapsed.

item.title: NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors cancels its profit distribution proposal
item.description: NoHo Partners Plc INSIDE INFORMATION 26 March 2020 at 22:30 NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors cancels its profit distribution proposal Due to the fast-changing coronavirus pandemic and the general financial uncertainty it causes, NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors has today decided to cancel the profit distribution proposal of EUR 0.

item.title: US coronavirus cases reach more than 101,000 as reported deaths hit new daily high
item.description: (CNN) The number of confirmed coronavirus cases in the United States topped 101,000 on Friday as infections quickly spread to new areas of the country. As of Friday evening, the US has at least 101,242 known cases of coronavirus and 1,588 people have died , according to CNN’s tally of cases reported by health officials.

item.title: Boris Johnson and Carrie Symonds
item.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson said Friday he has tested positive for the new coronavirus, but remains in charge of the U.K.‘s response to the outbreak. (adsbygoogle = window.

item.title: GMB viewers in hysterics after Edwina Currie's husband unknowingly appears in interview
item.description: Good Morning Britain viewers were left in hysterics after Edwina Currie’s husband accidentally upstaged her video interview on the show this morning. The former politician, 73, from Derbyshire, appeared on the show this morning to speak about her new show ‘Pilgrimage: The Road to Istanbul’.

item.title: How can Boris Johnson run the UK while suffering from coronavirus?
item.description: London (CNN) When British Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced on Friday morning that he had tested positive for coronavirus, he insisted that he would continue to head up his country’s fight against the pandemic.

item.title: YKS konuları neler? 12. sınıf müfredatı belli oldu!
item.description: 25-26 Temmuz’da yapılacak YKS sınavlar öncesinde öğrenciler sınavlara evden hazırlanırken, Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı’ndan (MEB) YKS ile ilgili açıklama yapıldı. YKS sınavına girecek öğrencilerin 9, 10, 11’inci sınıf müfredatına ek olarak 12’nci sınıfın sadece birinci döneminden sorumlu olacağı bildirildi.

item.title: Ajax footballer Abdelhak Nouri awakes from coma after 32 months
item.description: Abdelhak Nouri, a midfielder for Dutch football giants Ajax, has woken from a coma after two years, eight months and 19 days. The player’s brother Abderrahim said the 22-year-old woke up and showed signs of life, Dutch daily De Telegraaf reported late on Thursday.

item.title: In West African Coronavirus Hotspot, War Has Left 700,000 Homeless and Exposed
item.description: On March 18, Burkina Faso suffered the first confirmed Covid-19 fatality in all of sub-Saharan Africa. The victim was Rose-Marie Compaoré, the first vice president of the Sahelian nation’s parliament. Tiny, impoverished, and conflict-scarred, Burkina Faso is now West Africa’s worst-affected country, with 146 confirmed cases, including four government ministers.

item.title: 【新冠肺炎】《安眠書店》演員Mark Blum離世 麥當娜撰文悼念｜香港01｜電影

item.title: The Covid-19 culprit is us, not pangolins
item.description: Dr. Robert Breiman is an MD and a professor of Global Health and Infectious Diseases at Emory University. He was previously based in Bangladesh and Kenya with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and led investigations and response to a number of major outbreaks.

item.title: Star Trek: Picard is the dark reboot that boldly goes where nobody wanted it to
item.description: Trek used to be a vision of an optimistic future, but there is a world of difference between the Amazon reboot and previous adventures of the Enterprise It is the year 2364, and Jean-Luc Picard – the revered captain of the USS Enterprise – has just come face to face with three humans who have been frozen in time since the late 20th century.

item.title: وفاة مارك بلوم نجم مسلسل 'You' بسبب مضاعفات فيروس كورونا
item.description: كتب محمد رضا توفى الممثل الأمريكى العالمى مارك بلوم، من مضاعفات إصابته بالفيروسات التاجية كورونا المستجد “كوفيد 19”، والذى رحل عن يناهز 69 عامًا، وقد كان بلوم معروفًا بمشاركته فى أفلام مثل “Desperately Seeking Susan” و"“Crocodile Dundee، بالإضافة إلى مجموعة من مسرحيات Broadway والإنتاج المسرحى والأعمال التلفزيونية.

item.title: Coronavirus-Live-Ticker: Die Lage im Norden
item.description: Coronavirus-Live-Ticker: Erster Todesfall im Nordosten Der Kampf gegen die Ausbreitung des Coronavirus geht auch in Norddeutschland unvermindert weiter. NDR.de informiert auch an diesem Wochenende mit einem Live-Ticker über die aktuelle Situation.

item.title: – Jeg har jo kroppen til Per Sandberg før han gikk inn på «Farmen»
item.description: Koronakrisen har gitt Markus Neby og kjæresten Andrine Hegerberg uventede utfordringer. Markus Neby gjør stor suksess på TV om dagen sammen med Else Kåss Furuseth i lørdagsprogrammet «Kåss til kvelds» på NRK.

item.title: Clocks Change 2020: EU voted to SCRAP daylight saving time - why? Is this the last BST?
item.description: The clock change will happen in the UK on Sunday, March 29, meaning the country will lose one hour during its first lockdown weekend. The European Union voted to scrap the practice of moving clocks two years after the concept was proposed.

item.title: A Tesco 2 órával rövidíti nyitvatartását
item.description: Április 2-ától jön a változás, ami több mint kétszáz áruházat érint. A Magyar Nemzet úgy tudja, hogy a Tesco április 2-ától lerövidíti több mint kétszáz áruháza nyitva tartását. A cég ideiglenesen döntött így, vásárlói és munkavállalói egészsége érdekében.

item.title: Coronavirus: Estados Unidos supera a China y se convierte en el país con más contagios de covid-19 confirmados
item.description: Derechos de autor de la imagen Getty Images Image caption Trump hace días que ya no insiste en que su país tiene la epidemia bajo control. Estados Unidos superó en la tarde del jueves a China como el país con más contagios confirmados de covid-19, según datos de la Universidad Johns Hopkins.

item.title: Zeitumstellung März 2020: Ab wann ist Sommerzeit? Warum müssen wir noch Uhren umstellen?
item.description: Im März 2020 ist wieder Zeitumstellung auf Sommerzeit. Wann und warum müssen die Uhren umgestellt werden, obwohl Millionen Menschen dagegen stimmten? Ende März müssen die Uhren wieder umgestellt werden. müssen die Uhren wieder umgestellt werden.

item.title: Pearl Jam: Gigaton
item.description: Before they had anything—a legion of devoted fans, walls of platinum records, a destination festival—Pearl Jam had a community. In the Seattle grunge scene of the early ’90s, they emerged as part of a larger mosaic, members of a supergroup before their debut even came out.

item.title: Coronavirus, il Codacons chiede lo stop delle donazioni private. Ma invita i propri utenti a fare versamenti all’associazione (privata)
item.description: Il Codacons da un lato chiede lo stop delle donazioni private (da molti ritenute fondamentali in questo momento di difficoltà) ma, allo stesso tempo, spiega ai propri utenti come effettuare versamenti all’associazione dei consumatori guidata da Carlo Rienzi.

item.title: Fish on
item.description: Seizing the opportunity to fish the freshly exposed lakes now void of ice can reap rewards only known to the savviest fishermen. While many often wait to fish for panfish until the bluegills and sunfish to make their beds, typically at the beginning of June, there is a miraculous time right after the ice has retreated and before the lily pads consume the perimeter of the lakes.

item.title: Rammstein singer Till Lindemann in ICU at hospital in Germany [UPDATED]
item.description: Till Lindemann, photo by Jens Koch After a report Friday morning that Rammstein singer TIll Lindemann had tested positive for coronavirus, and was admitted into an intensive care unit at a hospital in Germany, the band has clarified the news.

item.title: Bank of Canada lowers overnight rate target to ¼ percent
item.description: The Bank of Canada today lowered its target for the overnight rate by 50 basis points to ¼ percent. The Bank Rate is correspondingly ½ percent and the deposit rate is ¼ percent.

item.title: Επίδομα 600 ευρώ: Οι 6 κλάδοι επαγγελματιών που το δικαιούνται
item.description: Δικηγόροι, μηχανικοί, γιατροί, λογιστές, εκπαιδευτικοί και ερευνητές αναμένεται να λάβουν το επίδομα των 600 ευρώ στο πλαίσιο μέτρων στήριξης λόγω του κορωνοϊού. Τα νέα μέτρα, σύμφωνα με τον υπουργό Οικονομικών, Χρήστο Σταϊκούρα, αφορούν κλάδους που δεν δικαιούνται το επίδομα των 800 ευρώ, στο πλαίσιο της δέσμης μέτρων στήριξης λόγω της πανδημίας του κορωνοϊού.

item.title: Integrante de Morat tiene coronavirus; todos los miembros se sometieron a cuarentena
item.description: A través de redes sociales, la banda colombiana Morat informó que uno de sus miembros dio positivo para COVID-19, por lo que decidieron someterse todos a cuarentena. El cuarteto está integrado por Juan Pablo Isaza, Simón Vargas, Juan Pablo Villamil y Martín Vargas.

item.title: Αυλαία στο Sport24 Radio - Τον ακολούθησε ο Legend - Η επόμενη κίνηση του Δημήτρη Μάρη
item.description: Έκλεισαν τα ραδιόφωνα του Δημήτρη Μάρη, Sport24 Radio και Legend 88.6 - Οι σκέψεις του επιχειρηματία για το επόμενο βήμα του Ο Sport24 Radio 103,3 σταμάτησε να εκπέμπει τα μεσάνυχτα. Ο σταθμός έκλεισε μετά από πέντε χρόνια λειτουργίας.

item.title: Alleged Nicolas Maduro co-conspirator is in US custody: Report
item.description: A retired Venezuelan army general indicted alongside Nicolas Maduro has surrendered in Colombia and is being taken by Drug Enforcement Administration agents to New York for arraignment, four people familiar with the situation told the Associated Press on Friday.

item.title: بعد 30 وفاة و536 إصابة.. ما موعد دخول مصر بذروة فيروس كورونا؟ وزيرة الصحة تجيب
item.description: دبي، الإمارات العربية المتحدة (CNN)— ارتفع عدد الإصابات التي سجلتها السلطات المصرية بفيروس كورونا الجديد أو ما بات يُعرف باسم “كوفيد-19” إلى 536 إصابة، حتى مساء الجمعة، مع تسجيل 30 حالة وفاة، وفقا لخالد مجاهد، المتحدث الرسمي لوزارة الصحة المصرية.

item.title: Zadic: „Wegweisungen auch während Quarantäne“
item.description: Außerdem rechnet Zadic mit einem Anstieg von häuslicher Gewalt, da viele Familien jetzt die meiste Zeit auf engem Raum leben müssen: „Ich bin hier in engem Kontakt mit dem Innenminister. Hier sei klargestellt, dass die Quarantäne kein rechtsfreier Raum ist und Wegweisungen durch die Polizei werden in dieser Zeit, wenn nötig, genauso durchgeführt.

item.title: Coronavirus: Simon Harris answers children's questions
item.description: Minister Simon Harris spoke with children in Ireland about their questions and concerns about coronavirus. Ireland’s Minister for Health Simon Harris appeared on RTÉ news2day on March 27 to address some concerns facing Ireland’s youth in the midst of the pandemic.

item.title: Guvernul a lansat un nou site oficial cu informații la zi despre evoluția cazurilor de COVID-19 în România
item.description: Guvernul României a lansat un nou site oficial cu informații la zi despre evoluția cazurilor de COVID-19 în România. Proiectul a fost realizat pro-bono de Code for Romania. “Astăzi, 25 martie, Guvernul României, prin Autoritatea pentru Digitalizarea României și organizația neguvernamentală Code for Romania, a lansat o nouă platformă online din ecosistemul de combatere a efectelor COVID-19, DateLaZi (datelazi.

item.title: Crowds Take To Manly Beach Ignoring Government Regulations
item.description: Dozens of beachgoers have been spotted sunbathing at Sydney’s Manly Beach. This is against the government’s direct instruction to ‘stay home’. The photos obtained by Channel 9, show beachgoers enjoying the warm weather, ignoring all COVID-19 social distancing rules.

item.title: Myer workers stood down as stores shut
item.description: Staff at Myer stores in Geelong and Werribee will be stood down as the retail giant shuts all of it’s stores for a month amid the Coronavirus pandemic. The retail giant will close all stores around the country from the close of business on Sunday for an initial four week period however all online business will continue to operate.

item.title: Cómo enviarle dinero a alguien que no tiene cuenta bancaria
item.description: El aislamiento social preventivo y obligatorio tuvo muchas consecuencias pero una de las más graves es la gente que no dispone de una cuenta bancaria y necesita recibir dinero. El problema es que suelen ser personas que reciben pagos directamente en efectivo.

item.title: Italy’s lockdown has been a recipe for disaster
item.description: More than 80,000 people in Italy are known to be infected with Covid-19 and 8,215 have died from it – nearly twice as many as any other country. Yet despite this dreadful outcome, in a video conference of G7 foreign ministers on 25 March Italy’s foreign minister, Luigi Di Maio, boasted about Italy’s lockdown model.
